Question: This person was born William Claude Dukenfield in Darby, Pennsylvania.
Hints: This person died in 1946, from an alcohol-related stomach hemorrhage, on the holiday he claimed to despise: Christmas Day.
This person married a fellow vaudevillian, chorus girl Harriet "Hattie" Hughes, on April 8, 1900.
This person was greatly distraught by this incident, and brooded about it for months.
